{{disambig-two|the father of [[Aerin]] in the later [[legendarium]]|grandfather of [[Tuor]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''|[[Indor (grandfather of Tuor)|Indor]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Edain|Adan]] | name=Indor | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Dor-lómin]] | affiliation= | language= | birth=[[First Age]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death=[[First Age]] | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Aerin]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Indor''' was a [[Dor-lómin|Man of Dor-lómin]] and the father of [[Aerin]] in the [[First Age]].{{CH|12}}, p. 189 == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| | | | | IND | |IND='''INDOR'''

''d. {{FA|496}}''}} {{familytree/end}} == Other versions of the legendarium == In the [[The Book of Lost Tales|earliest versions]] of the [[legendarium]], '''Indor''' was the father of [[Peleg]], in turn the father of [[Tuor]]. Therefore like Tuor he probably belonged to the [[House of the Swan]].{{LT2|III}} In ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' Tuor's grandfather is [[Galdor (Lord of Dor-lómin)|Galdor the Tall]].{{S|18}} {{references}} [[Category:Characters in The Children of Húrin]] [[Category:Edain]] [[Category:First Age characters]] [[Category:House of Hador]] [[de:Indor]] [[fi:Indor (Aerinin isä)]]
